name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-rss
title: Adaptive Card Extension PnP Weekly Feed
shortDescription: This ACE displays the PnP Weekly video recording RSS feed.
longDescription: This ACEs accesses the RSS feed from PnP Weekly and display episodes, audio and description as slider with search capability of description.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
